title: Simple SQL Injection Challenge
description: A basic challenge to teach SQL Injection vulnerabilities in web applications.
hints: Look at the login form and consider how inputs might be incorporated into SQL queries.
Think about how you can inject SQL that changes the logic of the query.
Consider how to comment out parts of SQL queries to manipulate execution.
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of SQL Injection
Learn to identify SQL injection vulnerabilities
Practice exploiting SQL Injection to bypass authentication
